subject: Re: [junit] Re: SecurityException: signer information does not match

So com.company.MyTest is coming from an unsigned .class file, and
com.compa=
ny.AgentClass
is coming from a signed .jar file.  Java doesn't like mixing =
signed and
unsigned classes in the same package, and is telling you so.  Th=
e easiest
thing to do may be to move your test class to a new package.
